titleStmt.title: SII 13.49: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 49. (A.R. No. 392 of 1913.) EṞUMBŪR, CHIDAMBARAM TALUK, SOUTH ARCOT DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE, KADAMBAVANĒŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This records an endowment of 7 mā of land to provide for the daily offering of rice to the deity in the temple of Śiṟu-Tirukkōyil-Perumānaḍigaḷ at Uṟumūr in Nalvayalūr-kūṟṟam by Āritaṉ Kaṇṇaṉ Kaṇṇaṉ of the village. The local sabhā undertook to maintain this gift.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kovirācakesarippanmarkku yāṇṭu 3vatu vaṭa
karai nalvayalūrkkūṟṟattu devatānam Uṟumurc ciṟu
ttirukkoyil perumāṉaṭikaḷukku Ivvūr Āritaṉ
kaṇṇaṉ kaṇṇaṉ tiruvamurtukku kuṭutta ni
lam mārāyampaḷḷamākiya kaṇattāḷ kiḻpāl
kkellai Uḻaiccāṇaṉ tattaṉ mātevaṉ nilattu
kku melkkum teṉppālkkellai kaṭampāṟṟukku
pāyñca vāykkālukku vaṭakkum melpālkkellai Āṉāṟṟukku
kiḻakku vaṭapālkkellai Ēṟivāykkālukku teṟkkum Ivvi
cainta perunāṉkellai Uḷ mikitikkuṟaivuḷḷaṭaṅka nilam
Ēḻumā Itu Uḻu(t)tup payireṟṟikkoṇṭu nicatam nāṉāḻi Araciyāl Oru tiruvamurtuk kāṭṭak kaṭavār I
ntat tirukkoyil Upāsakaṉ Inta tiruvamurtu kāṭṭuvikkakkaṭavom sabhaiōm Itu panmā- heśva[rar rakṣai .*]
Digital edition of SII 13.49 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
